title: [Snyk] SNYK-DEBIAN13-UTILLINUX-14200590 in util-linux/mount@2.41-5
description:
## Out-of-bounds Read

**Severity:** low
**Package:** util-linux/mount@2.41-5
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/Dockerfile`

**CVSS Score:** 6.1  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 150/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2025-14104](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-14104)

**Fix:** No automatic fix available. Review manually.

### Details
## NVD Description
**_Note:_** _Versions mentioned in the description apply only to the upstream `util-linux` package and not the `util-linux` package as distributed by `Debian`._
_See `How to fix?` for `Debian:13` relevant fixed versions and status._

A flaw was found in util-linux. This vulnerability allows a heap buffer overread when processing 256-byte usernames, specifically within the `setpwnam()` function, affecting SUID (Set User ID) login-utils utilities writing to the password database.
## Remediation
There is no fixed version for `Debian:13` `util-linux`.
